description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fu01n","text":"This protocol is used to visualize bacteria in and around gemmule-hatched freshwater sponges using a Eubacteria FISH probe. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"8feo8","text":"Freshwater sponge gemmules.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsmva","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31mat","text":"35 mm coverslip-bottom dishes with a 10 mm inner well diameter (Mattek #P35G-0-10-C). Note: you can use a different coverslip thickness, but the diameter of the inner well works with the volumes suggested in this protocol.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fqa9","text":"Fixative [4% formaldehyde (F8775-25ML Millepore) in 95% reagent alcohol].
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d1pn","text":"PBS-Tw [1x PBS (41620012 bioPLUS) containing 0.1% Tween-20 (P1379-500ML Sigma-Aldrich)].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b0ls","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4bpd","text":"Formamide, Deionized (0606-950mL Amresco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqjj4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjql9","text":"SSC (S24022-1000.0 RPI).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"563b8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqhjm","text":"Eub338 probe (Amann et al., 1995. Microbiological reviews.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":2},{"style":"italic","offset":34,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qa5f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62vb5","text":"Hybridization Buffer (Found in Molecular Instruments HCR‱ buffers pack in the HCR‱ RNA-FISH bundle).
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lhqq","text":"Hoechst 33342 stock solution [10mg/mL] (40046 Biotium).
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cej8","text":"Mounting medium [either Vectashield (H-1000 Vector Laboratories) or equivalent].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gnlb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7da8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D35D6319665311EFA7340A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CA60B511665311EFA8850A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"al4gf","text":"Add   mL of spring water to a 35mm coverslip bottom dish and place 1-3 gemmules into the center of the inner well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dq9jr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3-4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an22l","text":"Let grow in the dark (to reduce autofluorescence of algae) at   for about   (1 week) or until tissue appears developed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2pvca","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":604800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpa65","text":"Closer to the end of the incubation, prepare a 0.1% solution of Tween-20 in 1X PBS (now referred to as PBS-Tw) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85aje","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24pat","text":"Prepare 10% formamide in 2X SSC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i8hi","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gohq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ernr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"977v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n02r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"per sample","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"per sample","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66a58","text":"Do not breathe in fumes from formamide, handle this chemical in a fume hood.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
